description: Golden hashes for Euystacio core files - integrity verification baseline

integrity_principles.purpose: Verify integrity of sacred Euystacio documents and core system files

usage_notes: This file contains cryptographic hashes for key Euystacio files
Hashes are automatically generated and verified by scripts/auto_integrity.py
Any changes to monitored files will trigger integrity verification
Manual updates to this file should be done with care and proper authorization
All changes must align with Euystacio core principles and sentimento rhythm
